suggest.symfony/symfony: Used by the framework to serve applications.
suggest.symfony/monolog-bundle: Used for multiple logging tasks within the framework.
suggest.sensio/distribution-bundle: Used by Symfony for supporting code.
suggest.sensio/framework-extra-bundle: Used by the bundles for convenient functionality.
suggest.doctrine/orm: Used by the bundles as the database platform.
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-bundle: Used by the bundles to aid Doctrine related functionality.
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-cache-bundle: Used by the framework for various caching needs.
suggest.friendsofsymfony/rest-bundle: Used by the bundles to create the API.
suggest.jms/serializer-bundle: Used by the bundles to support the API.
suggest.willdurand/hateoas-bundle: Used by the bundles to support the API's advanced features.
suggest.white-october/pagerfanta-bundle: Used by the bundles for pagination.
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-migrations-bundle: May be used for database version control.
suggest.symfony/assetic-bundle: May be used to bundle/distribute assets to your application.
suggest.twig/extensions: May be used to add additional Twig functionality to views.
suggest.lexik/translation-bundle: May be used to add database driven translations.
suggest.gedmo/doctrine-extensions: May be used to add additional database functionality to Doctrine.
